item.description: <![CDATA[A murder took place on Sunday night in a village in Raichur district, where 35-year-old Basavaraj Timmayya was found dead. Timmayya, from Kalanger Doddi in Devadurg taluk, had been involved in a long-standing family dispute over a 3-acre land. The land, initially registered in his late uncle's name, was later transferred to his aunt, but Timmayya continued to work it, fueling tensions....]]>

item.title: Raichur woman sends mangalsutra to Parameshwara, seeks justice for husband
